author: ultpanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Fire Force cog! Get ready for pyrokinetic battles and infernal encounters. Use `[p]help fireforce` to get started.
name: FireForce
description: A complete game system inspired by the Fire Force anime/manga. Create characters with pyrokinetic abilities, battle infernals, and join special fire force companies!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including character information, battle statistics, and game progression data. This data can be removed through the Red bot's user data removal functions.
